model

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Event

  • @Entity
public class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class for Events. Used in the creation of the database table for Events through Hibernate.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Event

        public Event(int event_id,
             java.lang.String title,
             boolean fullday,
             java.sql.Date startDate,
             java.sql.Date endDate,
             java.sql.Time startTime,
             java.sql.Time endTime,
             boolean recurring,
             java.lang.String rrule,
             java.lang.String calendar)
        Constructor to create events.
        Parameters:
        event_id - the id number of the event in the database
        title - String describing what the event is.
        fullday - boolean showing if the event lasts all day
        startDate - Date on which the event starts
        endDate - Date on which the event ends
        recurring - boolean showing if the event recurs
        rrule - String describing how often the events recurs
        calendar - the calendar to which the event belongs to

      • Event
